channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Red Shoes and the Seven Dwarfs
channel.desc: This fairy?tale spoof reimagines Snow White as ?Red Shoes,? who steals a magic pair of red shoes and transforms herself. When seven cursed princes (turned into green dwarfs) seek a kiss from the "most beautiful woman" to break their spell, they join forces with her to stop a wicked stepmother and reclaim their true selves. Themes include beauty, self-acceptance, and true love.
